backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profile management with role-based access control (admin/user permissions) and a public contact form submission system with admin-only viewing of submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four admin login authentication features (REQ-32 through REQ-35) involving AdminAuthGuard, useAuth hook, and AdminLogin page components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styling with focus on construction company website features and admin authentication flow.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with neutral grayscale palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for Simran Enterprises Website with root div and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining seven routes (Home, About, Services, Gallery, Contact, Admin, AdminLogin) with Layout wrapper and router provider setup.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAuthG: Authentication guard component that checks isAuthenticated from useAuth hook and redirects unauthenticated users to /admin/login with current path as redirect parameter.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContactDet: Dialog component displaying full contact submission details (name, phone, email, message, timestamp) with formatted date and clickable contact links.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContactsTa: Admin table component for displaying contact submissions with search filtering, sortable timestamp column, and row click to open ContactDetailDialog.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form component with name, phone, email, and message fields that submits via useSubmitContact hook and displays success state with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactI: Displays company contact information (phone numbers, email, address), WhatsApp chat button, and business hours in card layouts.
frontend/src/components/contact/MapEmbed: Embeds a Google Maps iframe showing the company location in Ambernath with address details.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ImageGri: Grid display of project images with hover effects and click-to-open dialog for full-size viewing, showing project title and category badges.
frontend/src/components/home/AboutPrevie: Home page section introducing Simran Enterprises and owner Sandeep Paswan with an image and call-to-action button to the about page.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Full-width hero banner with background image, headline, tagline, and call-to-action button linking to the contact page.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesHig: Grid of service cards (residential, commercial, interior, renovation, civil) with images and descriptions that navigate to the services page on click.
frontend/src/components/home/WhyChooseUs: Four-column feature grid highlighting company strengths (quality, experience, timeliness, satisfaction) with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer with company info, contact details, social media links, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Navigation header component with logo, desktop/mobile menus, and conditional Admin link for authenticated users. Uses TanStack Router for navigation and Sheet component for mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Main layout wrapper component that renders Header, Footer, and an Outlet for nested routes in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Service display card component with alternating image/text layout, showing title, description, and feature list with checkmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Zustand store for admin authentication with hardcoded credentials (admin@gmail.com/Admin@92505), persisted to localStorage, providing login/logout functions and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login/logout flows, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for contact form operations: useSubmitContact mutation to submit contact data and useGetAllContacts query to fetch all contact entries from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom teal-based color scheme for light/dark modes, typography settings using Inter font, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page displaying company information, founder Sandeep Paswan's profile with portrait, location details, and mission/vision/values sections with icons.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page protected by authentication, displaying contact form submissions in a table with logout functionality and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page component with email/password authentication form, redirects authenticated users to admin dashboard, displays company branding and features list.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page component that renders ContactForm, ContactInfo, and MapEmbed components with heading and description.
frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx: Gallery page displaying a grid of project images across categories (Interior Design, Residential, Commercial) using the ImageGrid component.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page component that renders HeroSection, AboutPreview, ServicesHighlight, and WhyChooseUs sections in sequence.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Services page displaying five service offerings (Residential, Commercial, Interior, Renovation, Civil) with detailed descriptions and features using ServiceCard components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and session storage, supporting both regular and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended animations, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining Simran Enterprises website architecture, features, known issues (login not working), and business details including GST number and admin credentials.
